ISSUE.TITLE: Bug report: Animations default-enabled on Android even if disabled system-wide
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug LocalSend Android unfortunately ignores system animation settings and upon first launch enables its own animations in any case. ### To reproduce 1. Enable _Developer options_ 2. Disable animations in _Developer options_ 3. Run _LocalSend_ **for the first time** 4. In its settings, observe _Animations_ toggle being **enabled** ### Expected behavior The _Animations_ toggle is never being enabled on its own, especially not by default. Additionally it could be greyed-out if all animations are disabled system-wide. ### Screenshots _No response_ ### Desktop (please complete the following information) _No response_ ### Smartphone (please complete the following information) - OS: Android 13 - Version: 1.17.0 ### Additional context _No response_
